headline: Lululemon sends stern warning to customers about its leggings
summary: Lululemon, which is popular for its luxury athletic wear, recently suffered an embarrassing botch with the release of a new collection. Earlier this month, Lululemon launched its new “Get Low” collection in the U.S., which features a line of seamless, sweat-wicking workout training gear such as ...

headline: Down 10% Already in 2026, Is Lululemon Stock a Buy?
summary: Despite recently announcing that it expects its fourth-quarter results to be at the high end of its guidance range, shares are getting crushed.

headline: lululemon Stock Looks Cheap: Buy Now or Wait for Better Entry Point?

headline: Reassessing Lululemon (LULU) After A 52% Share Price Slide And Mixed Valuation Signals
summary: If you are wondering whether lululemon athletica's current share price lines up with its underlying worth, you are not alone. This article is built to help you make sense of that question. At a last close of US$192.79, the stock sits after a 4.5% decline over the past week, with a 7.7% decline over 30 days, an 8.5% decline year to date, and a 52.1% decline over 1 year, alongside 36.3% and 42.2% declines across the past 3 and 5 years. Recent news coverage around lululemon has focused on how...
